titles.title: Veterans Identity Security Act of 2006
To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish criminal penalties for the unauthorized disclosure of records containing personal information about veterans.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Executive Comment Requested from Veterans' Affairs.
Favorable Executive Comment Received from Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/24/2006--Introduced. Veterans Identity Security Act of 2006 - Establishes criminal penalties for the unauthorized disclosure of records containing personal information about veterans by a Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) officer or employee, contractor (or employee of a contractor), or volunteer.
